function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Subjects with weak immune systems at risk of symptomatic infection, including those undergoing immunosuppressive therapy and those with excessive workload or irregular sleep patterns.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infection and severe symptoms, leading to potential complications and risk of fatality.","Mitigation":"Improving immune system function through lifestyle changes, reducing workload, and regulating sleep patterns. Implementing preventive measures and hygiene practices to reduce transmission.","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, air purification systems, and personal protective equipment (PPE).","People":"Subjects with weak immune systems, individuals with irregular sleep patterns, and those with excessive workloads.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, employers, and individuals."},{"Description":"Transmission routes of SARS-CoV-2 include direct contact, droplet deposition on surfaces and people, and airborne cross-infection through exhaled air.","Impact":"Increased potential for rapid spread of the virus, leading to outbreaks and clusters of infection.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing, wearing masks, improving ventilation systems, and promoting good respiratory hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and advanced ventilation technologies.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and individuals in close contact with infected individuals.","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, and individuals."}]}
